alert.note: Alert for Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Waushara County through 600 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westfield, or 15 miles southwest of Wautoma, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plainfield around 540 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
